contents.name: profile
contents.caption:
Hello!

I am a 15 year old student, programmer, and gaming enthusiast.

Particularly, I am interested in topics and algorithms regarding artificial intelligence such as simulated annealing, hill climbing, ant colony optimization, and minimax. I regularly participate in online AI competitions, namely RobotGame and Vindinium. Also, I am proficient in Linux server administration and database management.

Otherwise, I enjoy biking and jogging frequently as well as hiking. I'm currently a Life Scout, one rank below the highest rank of Eagle. As for school, I attend Westlake High School in California. I work [mainly] as a writer at the high school yearbook.

For forums and other online accounts, I often go by the name of dmhacker.
